headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PARGH, HARRIET TURIM

lead_paragraph: PARGH--Harriet Turim, born September 28, 1916, died peacefully on February 25, 2014 at her home in North Shore Towers, Floral Park, NY. Harriet grew up in Far Rockaway and left Hunter College to work during the Depression, rising to Vice President Sales in a dynamic 50 year career at Packaging Systems Corp. She was a world traveler who was active in Hadassah, volunteered at Long Island Jewish Hospital, and never turned down a card game. She is survived by her daughter Edith, son Jonathan, and grandchildren Rachel Yohay, David Yohay, David Pargh, and William Pargh. She joins her beloved husband David (died 1974) in Mt Ararat Cemetery in Farmingdale, LI.
